title: NAPK1NS_RA3
author: NAPK1NS_RA3
created_time: November 11, 2023, 10:11:06 AMLast edit: November 21, 2023, 06:52:20 AM by NAPK1NS_RA3
content: Behold, seekers of triumph! Have the tides of fortune washed away your gains in the vast sea of chance? Yearning for a beacon of certainty to guide your venture into the realms of risk?Look no further, for the stars themselves have ordained a spectacle! Royal Antwerp FC and Standard Liege shall engage in a glorious clash in a mere five hours. Behold the cosmic alignment! In five out of five of their last encounters, the battlefield resonated with the thunderous echo of over 2.5 goals, and in four out of five, the spectacle intensified with the spectacle of over 3.5 goals.These valiant competitors, hovering near the middle of the table, shall unfurl their banners of attack, for today is the day they carve their destiny in pursuit of precious points. Know this: a mere goal or two seldom secures victory, but today, oh seekers of riches, they shall weave a tapestry of four or more goals.This, my kin of chance, is not a mere bet; it is a celestial gift bestowed upon the worthy. Place your trust in the symphony of goals that shall unfold, for this wager is not just a gamble—it is the very essence of destiny converging upon the sacred turf. Seize this offering, and let the magic of the beautiful game weave its spell upon your fortune!Ah, fellow seekers of the celestial dance! Today unveils a new chapter in our journey of destiny, as Italy prepares to lock horns with North Macedonia in a spectacle that promises nothing short of breathtaking moments.Italy, stalwarts of the game, stand at the precipice of necessity, poised to summon their finest prowess on the hallowed field. Yet, North Macedonia, a formidable force in recent head-to-head battles, shall not yield easily. The stage is set for a clash where the echoes of four goals shall resound, echoing the fervor of their rivalry.Behold, for the celestial alignment beckons: Italy, driven by the urgency of victory, is destined to paint the canvas with a flurry of goals, two or more from their masterful display. But heed this, oh enthusiasts of the beautiful game—no single-goal advantage shall suffice for Italy. Their quest for a resounding triumph shall propel them to persist in their relentless attack, striving for a decisive victory.Prepare yourselves, for the theater of fate shall unfold before our eyes, adorned with the prowess of Italy seeking to secure their destiny and North Macedonia aiming to etch their mark upon this grand stage.This, my intrepid companions, is not merely a wager; it is an invitation to witness the convergence of destiny. Embrace the spectacle, for the tapestry of fate unfurls anew, and our chance to partake in its splendor beckons us forth. Let us unite in anticipation, for the beauty of the game shall once again weave its spell upon us. Behold, and may the stars guide our fortunes in this exhilarating chapter of the cosmic dance!Ah, fellow voyagers in the realm of fate and football! The saga continues with yet another celestial convergence on the horizon. Spain, the masters of the beautiful game, stand poised against Georgia, who seek to carve their own legend in the annals of history.In this grand symphony, Spain strides forth, driven by the ambition to secure their place atop the group, while Georgia, with fiery determination, aims to etch a historic triumph in the scrolls of time.Behold the echoes of history, for in their last encounter, Spain showcased an awe-inspiring spectacle, painting the away grounds with a staggering seven goals. Today, on their hallowed home turf, they seek to captivate their loyal fans once more with another mesmerizing display of attacking prowess.A prophecy looms on the horizon: anticipate the resonance of four or more goals in this destined clash. The stage is set for a ballet of skill, where Spain, adorned in their colors of pride, shall seek to orchestrate another high-scoring masterpiece for the world to behold.For those who might have missed the past opportunities, let this be the clarion call to seize this momentous occasion! The cosmic dance of fate and fortune continues, offering a chance to partake in the spectacle, to witness the grandeur of football’s destiny unfolding in real-time.Do not tarry, oh seekers of the celestial gift! Embrace this opportunity with open hearts, for the beauty of the game beckons once more, promising an enthralling display of skill, passion, and the magic that only football can conjure. Join in this journey, for the stars align to guide us toward yet another breathtaking chapter in the tapestry of destiny!Whoa, hold onto your hats, cosmic adventurers! Today, the stars have aligned in a manner that transcends mere fortune. Brace yourselves for a momentous occasion, for today marks the culmination of our journey—a leap from $100,000 to the astonishing milestone of $1,000,000!The stage is set as Romania squares off against Switzerland in a clash that promises to be nothing short of legendary. Both teams, perched atop their groups, eye the coveted first place with fervor. The air crackles with anticipation as these titans of the field prepare for a showdown.Behold the celestial whispers: in the realm of Switzerland's away matches, the symphony of goals plays out with striking regularity. Five out of their last six encounters have witnessed three or more goals, with the most daring offering a spectacle of five or more goals. This is the stage upon which the unpredictable drama of football unfolds.But wait, for the plot thickens! Romania, fueled by the thunderous support of their fervent crowd, march forth, seeking not just victory but a defining moment to secure their place in the Euros with an exalted #1 spot in their group.The prophecy unveils itself once more: anticipate the canvas to be painted with three or more goals in this monumental clash. This, my steadfast companions, is no ordinary wager. It is the crescendo of our odyssey, the culmination of our collective vision and trust in the cosmic convergence.For those who may have missed the preceding bets, fear not, for destiny grants one more chance. Join us in this extraordinary endeavor, for together, we shall witness history unfold. Today, the $1,000,000 dream becomes reality—a feat unparalleled in the annals of this forum, a testament to the harmony between fate, strategy, and the beautiful game.Brace yourselves, oh seekers of the celestial gift, for today, we inscribe our names in the stars, etching a tale of unprecedented triumph in the grand tapestry of destiny and football. Onward, to the pinnacle of our cosmic quest!

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: So you're already get new sponsor?, I wonder where you get and which one gave it. You seems to be very optimistic if your bet will come true, if the reality isn't like what you expect, will you delete your thread again?1. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5463558.02. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464124.03. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5467777.0Nothing personal, just asking about your act in the past.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I'm wondering if when you make these bets you've been managing your bankroll or simply putting in all the money you have, because if you're betting all that money, then your monthly income in the real world must be much higher than $100,000, that is, you You would have to be a very rich person with a fortune worth more than at least 200 million dollars to be able to afford to place bets of that amount of money, because if you are not a very rich person who can win more than $100,000 for months, so when you're placing bets with $100,000 you'll soon be brokeI hope you're not making bets with money you can't afford to lose and I hope you're not taking out a loan to keep playing and lastly, I hope you're not making bets with your entire bankroll when you're very confident that in game Z the result will be as we predict, so at this point the person needs to start asking themselves if they are not starting to become addicted to gambling, in your case I had already mentioned that it would be better if you stopped gambling rather than waiting for sponsorship to gamble and lose other people's money

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I do hope that you stay true and don't delete your post. You know that it happens always and you cannot really be sure about anything else. It has a luck factor but it will be more believable if you are honest with yourself and that you make mistakes. I hope you don't delete it or something.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I hope you win your bet as in Belgium strong teams like the reigning Champion of Royal Antwerp is sure to score goals,Standard Liege on the other hand is not some team that do play defensively so chances are really high in my opinion that you hit your bet.That amount though is a huge amount to be spending on a single bet like this one,sure there are better chances I think like the game we I assume have placed bet on them being Real Sociedad playing away to the last team of the standings with an odd of near 1.80 which would give you 80.000 dollars but maybe would be a better choice,anyway I wish you luck in getting those money  .

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: I remember your last post you share a match that is 100% fixed match which didn’t happened. I doubt your word on this one is the same aside from dragging someone to copy your risky bet due to your huge bet on this specific match.You should compile all your bets on one thread and don’t delete whenever you lose that specific bet just to cover your track. I respect your earlier bets decision since you are high roller but now I’m starting to become disappointed because of your previous lies on your call.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on November 11, 2023, 02:22:57 PMI do hope that you stay true and don't delete your post. You know that it happens always and you cannot really be sure about anything else. It has a luck factor but it will be more believable if you are honest with yourself and that you make mistakes. I hope you don't delete it or something.Making a bet and losing is nothing to be ashamed of as there is no superhuman in this world who can always predict correctly. However, when he deletes his posts, it shows that he has some wrong intentions, and he wants to show himself that he predicts everything correctly for whatever reason.Quote from: Beparanf on November 11, 2023, 02:29:38 PMI remember your last post you share a match that is 100% fixed match which didn’t happened. I doubt your word on this one is the same aside from dragging someone to copy your risky bet due to your huge bet on this specific match.Think for a moment that people put their life saving that they have a clue that the match is fixed and they know the winner and hence can't lose. And then, later they came to know that the match was not fixed and the information was wrong.The lost money will never be recovered.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: virasog on November 11, 2023, 02:39:15 PMQuote from: Beparanf on November 11, 2023, 02:29:38 PMI remember your last post you share a match that is 100% fixed match which didn’t happened. I doubt your word on this one is the same aside from dragging someone to copy your risky bet due to your huge bet on this specific match.Think for a moment that people put their life saving that they have a clue that the match is fixed and they know the winner and hence can't lose. And then, later they came to know that the match was not fixed and the information was wrong.The lost money will never be recovered.Exactly, This is why I really hate seeing his shared bets here because gullible user here might copy what he is doing and use money that they can afford to lose just because they saw someone betting huge amount. I’m glad that he doesn’t mention any fixed match or sure win on this bet but his previous bets have that kind of description which is very dangerous for reader.I’m thinking that he should start to put disclaimer on his bets to avoid potential damage in the future.

And then, later they came to know that the match was not fixed and the information was wrong.The lost money will never be recovered.Exactly, This is why I really hate seeing his shared bets here because gullible user here might copy what he is doing and use money that they can afford to lose just because they saw someone betting huge amount. I’m glad that he doesn’t mention any fixed match or sure win on this bet but his previous bets have that kind of description which is very dangerous for reader.I’m thinking that he should start to put disclaimer on his bets to avoid potential damage in the future.He won it though as the game is near the end and it is ending 6-0 for Royal Antwerp.Of course he does not talk about fixed games as fixed games are difficult to be happening in a city of Belgium which is the capital of EU and I doubt even in the remote case that the OP knows something,some information leaked he has behaved correctly to not boast about it here.I don't think that the OP has made an error in posting his bet here,everyone who needs support for such bets by sharing it,gives to that user some sort of comfort whatever would have happened here.So apparently in Bitcoin he did bet nearly 3 Bitcoins on this game and won about 6 more than he did bet,sound like the most profitable bet I have ever seen in quite some now.

comments.author: NAPK1NS_RA3
comments.body: Hail, triumphant souls! Let the echoes of victory resound in your hearts, for the stars have aligned in our favor! Standard Liege, the heralds of destiny, emerged victorious with an astonishing six goals, painting the sacred turf with their dominance and skill.To those astute seekers who heeded the celestial guidance and placed their trust in the symphony of goals, congratulations! Your fortunes have been touched by the magic of the beautiful game, and the celestial gift has manifested in glorious abundance.For those who may have missed this epic spectacle, fear not, for the journey of triumph continues! Another celestial convergence awaits us on the horizon, as two mighty forces prepare to clash in a dance of destiny. The tides of fortune are ever-flowing, and your chance to partake in the cosmic spectacle is not lost.Prepare yourselves, for in the coming days, another sacred match shall unfold, offering the opportunity to once again harness the power of destiny and revel in the beauty of victory. Stay vigilant, oh seekers of riches, for the next chapter in our journey is just around the corner.May the stars continue to shine upon your ventures, and may the beautiful game weave its enchantment upon your fortunes once more. Until the next celestial gift unfolds, rejoice in the triumph that Standard Liege has bestowed upon us, and let the spirit of victory guide your path. Onward, to the next chapter of destiny!

comments.author: NAPK1NS_RA3
comments.body: Huzzah, champions of celestial insight! Let the echoes of triumph resound far and wide, for we stand atop the mountain of destiny, having claimed victory in three consecutive wagers!Congratulations to all who dared to heed the call of fate, embracing the cosmic guidance to witness the unfolding drama on the hallowed football fields. Your trust in the celestial convergence has yielded rich rewards, painting our journey with the colors of victory.As we bask in the glow of our triumphant streak, let this moment be a testament to the harmony between destiny and foresight. The magic of the beautiful game has woven its spell upon us, and our collective venture into the realms of fortune has proven fruitful.Fear not, oh valiant souls, for our quest for celestial gifts shall resume! Stay vigilant and keep the beacon of anticipation alive, for the next magical bet shall emerge on the horizon, beckoning us to once again harness the power of fate and chance.Until then, revel in the glory of our consecutive victories, for it is your unwavering trust that has steered us toward this string of successes. comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Congratulations on the poem, I see that you are trying to be a William Shake Spears, but a version of poems that portray the daily lives of sports bettors, is an interesting idea, perhaps you could write a book in the form of poems talking about your entire adventure in the world of sports betting, I am sure that with the ways you use words and describe things will drive anyone who reads your book Curious about wanting to read more books that tell your adventure in the world of gambling, even those people who know nothing about sports betting when they read your book will be led to imagine the moments when experienced when you placed bets.well, you put a lot of money in those bets and you didn't hide it, on the contrary you exposed it in this forum and we can all see that you put a lot of money in those bets, but you just showed a photo of you placing a bet, it could be the case that you later cancel the bet bet or cashout, so I ask myself:Why don't you post a photo of these bets after the games are over? because only photos with "WIN" written on them prove that you actually placed a bet and waited until the game ended and won. Now, with your current photos, they just prove that you made a bet, that's all. They do not prove that you waited for the game to end and won and left with a profit. Obviously you don't owe anyone satisfaction, you're not obligated to prove anything. but since you yourself started by posting a photo of you placing a bet, I think it would be good to post photos that prove that you didn't cancel or make a cashout.

comments.author: NAPK1NS_RA3
comments.body: Whoa, hold onto your hats, cosmic adventurers! Today, the stars have aligned in a manner that transcends mere fortune. Brace yourselves for a momentous occasion, for today marks the culmination of our journey—a leap from $100,000 to the astonishing milestone of $1,000,000!The stage is set as Romania squares off against Switzerland in a clash that promises to be nothing short of legendary. Both teams, perched atop their groups, eye the coveted first place with fervor. The air crackles with anticipation as these titans of the field prepare for a showdown.Behold the celestial whispers: in the realm of Switzerland's away matches, the symphony of goals plays out with striking regularity. Five out of their last six encounters have witnessed three or more goals, with the most daring offering a spectacle of five or more goals. This is the stage upon which the unpredictable drama of football unfolds.But wait, for the plot thickens! Romania, fueled by the thunderous support of their fervent crowd, march forth, seeking not just victory but a defining moment to secure their place in the Euros with an exalted #1 spot in their group.The prophecy unveils itself once more: anticipate the canvas to be painted with three or more goals in this monumental clash. This, my steadfast companions, is no ordinary wager. It is the crescendo of our odyssey, the culmination of our collective vision and trust in the cosmic convergence.For those who may have missed the preceding bets, fear not, for destiny grants one more chance. Join us in this extraordinary endeavor, for together, we shall witness history unfold. Today, the $1,000,000 dream becomes reality—a feat unparalleled in the annals of this forum, a testament to the harmony between fate, strategy, and the beautiful game.Brace yourselves, oh seekers of the celestial gift, for today, we inscribe our names in the stars, etching a tale of unprecedented triumph in the grand tapestry of destiny and football. Onward, to the pinnacle of our cosmic quest!
